definitions.definition: Lacking critique or critical examination; undiscriminating .
Having a disregard for critical standards or procedures . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

examples: uncritical to the point of tolerating incompetence, jeopardizing the business model

main_definition: Lacking critique or critical examination; undiscriminating .
secondary_definitions: Having a disregard for critical standards or procedures . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
